tool_description: Schedules and manages recurring web scraping tasks with configurable frequencies and retry policies.

task_name.description: Unique name for the scraping task

retry_attempts.description: Number of retry attempts on failure (0-5)

start_time.description: When to start the schedule (ISO 8601 format)

end_time.description: When to end the schedule (ISO 8601 format)

error_messages: Invalid frequency format: Use formats like 'every 30 minutes', 'hourly', 'daily at 09:00', 'weekly'.
Empty URL list: At least one target URL must be provided.
Invalid retry parameters: retry_attempts must be 0-5, retry_delay must be 30-300 seconds.
Invalid time format: Use ISO 8601 format for start_time and end_time.
Invalid priority level: Use one of [low, normal, high].
Task name conflict: A task with this name already exists.
Schedule conflict: end_time must be after start_time.
usage: Create a named scraping task with target URLs and frequency. Configure retry policy and timing as needed. Returns schedule confirmation with task ID.

task_id.description: Unique identifier for the scheduled task

schedule_active.description: Whether the schedule is currently active

urls_count.description: Number of URLs in the task
